Reviews.Title: IT GETS WAY TOO HOT, AND DID NOT WORK PROPERLY WITH SERATO SOFTWARE
Reviews.Author: Francisco A. Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: THE FIRST LAPTOP i BOUGHT FROM RAIN COMPUTER DID NOT CONNECT TO WI-FI, I EXCHANGED IT AND NOW I HAVE A DIFFERENT PROBLEM, THE LAPTOP GETS VERY HOT, WAY TOO HOT, NOT EVEN NORMAL AND IT DOESNT WORK PROPERLY WITH SERATO DJ SOFTWARE, AND WHEN CONNECTING IT TO MY MIXING CONSOLE YOU CAN HEAR A VERY BAD AND ANNOYING SOUND IN THE BACKGROUND... TOO EXPENSIVE AND DOESNT DO THE JOB, ALSO CUSTOMER SERVICE SUCKS AND YOU'RE LUCKY IF SOMEONE ANSWERS THE PHONE - I'M RETURNING IT FOR A FULL REFUND - DO NOT BUY

Designed for audio production and DJ with software like Pro Tools and Serato

Brand new hi-res 15.6" backlit LCD display powered by NVIDIA GeForce GT 540M
USB 3.0 and eSATA for high speed streaming to your audio interface and external drives
One Free Rain Ensemble Plug and Play Session for help with all your gear

1 x Mic In
1x S/PDIF Optical Out; Webcam: 2.0 Megapixel CMOS
Full Size Keyboard with Numeric Keypad
